fact-2.value: The Company is a UK investment trust with a premium listing on the Main Market of the London Stock Exchange. The Company invests in European logistics real estate to achieve its investment objective noted below.

fact-4.value: As indicated at the time of the half yearly results, in order to align the Company’s name with the name of the Manager’s business, which recently changed to abrdn plc, the Board resolved to change the Company’s name to abrdn European Logistics Income plc. This took effect  from 1 January 2022. The Company’s ticker, ASLI, remains unchanged.

fact-5.value: Bow Bells House 1 Bread Street London EC4M 9HH
